titles.title: VA Peer Specialists Act
VA Peer Specialists Act
To direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to conduct an assessment of the capacity of peer specialists of the Department of Veterans Affairs who are women, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
VA Peer Specialists Act
This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to consult with its Inspector General to (1) commence an assessment of the capacity of VA peer specialists who are women, and (2) submit a plan to hire additional qualified peer specialists who are women based on the results of the assessment.
